text: The tram system in Kraków (Polish: Kraków; (pronounced: ); variant English spelling Cracow; in full Royal Capital City of Krakow, Polish: Królewskie Stołeczne Miasto Kraków) is used by Polish residents and tourists to travel long distances, mostly used by those without cars. The rail system of Kraków has been in operaration since 1882 (115 years ago). They are like Buses in Kraków, but these are trams and not buses. Krakow Category:Transport in Poland Category:Kraków
title: Trams in Kraków
